summary: Black dog with a white nose, white socks and a white tipped tail :D
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana][heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Black dog with a white nose, white socks and a white tipped tail :D
Yes its the long awaited sequel to Brown and White Dog haha
Since people like the brown and white one I thought i\'d give this further option enjoy :)

[heading]UPDATE HISTORY[/heading]
Update 2.0 : Sharpened normal map, fixed tongue and teeth, added cute blue eyes
Update 1.1 : Updated normal map for a healthier, shinier coat

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data\\

Check out the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1381]brown version here[/url]

[heading]OTHER MODS[/heading][b]
